name: HunyuanVideo-I2V
description: HunyuanVideo-I2V: A Customizable Image-to-Video Model based on HunyuanVideo
readme_summary: HunyuanVideo-I2V is an image-to-video generation framework built upon HunyuanVideo. It provides PyTorch model definitions, pre-trained weights, and inference code for generating videos from still images. The repository also includes LoRA training code, enabling users to customize video effects and create unique visual experiences.
key_features: LoRA training code for customizable special effects
Parallel inference code powered by xDiT
primary_use_case: Generating videos from images, allowing for customizable special effects through LoRA training.
cover_image_prompt: A skilled sculptor meticulously chiseling a block of raw stone into a lifelike video, showcasing the transformation from a static image to dynamic motion. The sculptor's tools emit glowing particles, subtly representing the diffusion process. A holographic screen displays the original image and the emerging video side-by-side. The workshop is bathed in soft, cinematic lighting, highlighting the artistry and precision involved. Small UI elements and code snippets are subtly integrated into the background, connecting the metaphor to software. The composition is clean and focused, with a warm color scheme. The image should be in a digital painting style with clear outlines and rich details.

name: stable-virtual-camera
description: Stable Virtual Camera: Generative View Synthesis with Diffusion Models
readme_summary: The Stable Virtual Camera repository provides a diffusion model for Novel View Synthesis (NVS), enabling the generation of 3D consistent novel views of a scene given multiple input images. It offers both a user-friendly Gradio demo and a command-line interface for more advanced users and researchers, facilitating interactive exploration and fine-grained control over the model.
key_features: CLI demo for power users and researchers
primary_use_case: Generating 3D consistent novel views of a scene from multiple input views using a diffusion model.
cover_image_prompt: Imagine a skilled artisan sculpting a panoramic landscape from fragmented photographs using a magical lens. The artisan carefully arranges the photos on a workbench, then gazes through the lens, which seamlessly blends the images into a cohesive, 3D-consistent vista. Digital particles swirl around the lens, subtly displaying camera parameters and view transformations. The artisan's workshop is bathed in soft, diffused light, with subtle UI elements displaying the 'Stable Virtual Camera' logo. The scene should be in a 3D isometric illustration style with vibrant colors and intricate details, conveying the power of generative view synthesis.

name: my-yt
description: A clean and minimal youtube frontend, without all the ads and whistles
readme_summary: My-yt is a lightweight YouTube frontend designed to provide a distraction-free viewing experience. It leverages yt-dlp for video downloading and offers features like SponsorBlock integration, clickbait thumbnail removal, and local AI-powered video summarization. The application prioritizes simplicity and control, allowing users to manage their subscriptions, ignore unwanted videos, and enjoy offline playback.
key_features: Download videos from YouTube using yt-dlp
Video summarization using local AI model
Subtitles using <track> element and WebVTT API
primary_use_case: A clean and minimal YouTube frontend for local, mindful, and succinct video consumption.
cover_image_prompt: A librarian meticulously curating a vast digital library, removing distracting advertisements and irrelevant content from video streams flowing onto their desk. The librarian uses a special tool to filter out unwanted elements, leaving only the essential video content. A clean, minimalist interface hovers above the desk, displaying only the video and subtitles. The scene is set in a quiet, focused study with soft lighting. Small code snippets and data visualizations subtly connect the metaphor to software. The composition is clean and focused with a muted color scheme. The image should be in flat design style with clear iconography.

name: kyanos
description: Kyanos is a networking analysis tool using eBPF. It can visualize the time packets spend in the kernel, capture requests/responses, makes troubleshooting more efficient.
readme_summary: Kyanos is an eBPF-based network analysis tool designed to efficiently troubleshoot network issues. It offers powerful traffic filtering, advanced analysis capabilities through aggregated packet metrics, and in-depth kernel-level latency details. Kyanos aims to simplify network troubleshooting by providing a lightweight, dependency-free solution.
key_features: Traffic filtering by IP/port, process/container, L7 protocol, request/response size, latency
primary_use_case: Network issue analysis and troubleshooting, including identifying slow requests and diagnosing latency issues.
cover_image_prompt: Imagine a skilled detective, illuminated by the glow of a monitor displaying intricate network diagrams, meticulously tracing the path of data packets like clues in a complex case. The detective uses a magnifying glass to examine packets flowing through a vibrant, glowing network represented as a cityscape with data streams as roads. The city has bottlenecks and the detective is identifying the slowest routes. Subtle UI elements on the monitor display real-time network metrics and latency details. The scene is set in a modern, high-tech office with a dark, moody atmosphere. The image should be in a digital painting style with sharp focus and dramatic lighting.

name: keep
description: The open-source AIOps and alert management platform
readme_summary: Keep is an open-source AIOps platform designed for alert management. It provides a single pane of glass for managing alerts, offering features like deduplication, correlation, and enrichment. The platform supports bi-directional integrations with monitoring tools and enables workflow automation, leveraging AI for correlation and summarization to streamline incident resolution.
key_features: Single pane of glass for alerts and incidents
Alert deduplication, correlation, filtering, and enrichment
cover_image_prompt: Imagine a skilled conductor orchestrating a symphony of alerts and incidents, transforming chaos into harmony. The conductor stands before a massive control panel, filtering and correlating incoming alerts represented by musical notes. As the conductor adjusts the settings, the notes coalesce into a beautiful, coherent melody, symbolizing the resolution of incidents. Subtle UI elements glow on the control panel, displaying real-time data and workflow automations. The scene is set in a futuristic control room with soft, ambient lighting. The image should be in 3D isometric illustration style with vibrant colors and intricate details.

name: aisuite
description: Simple, unified interface to multiple Generative AI providers
readme_summary: Aisuite provides a unified interface for interacting with multiple Generative AI providers, simplifying the process of swapping and testing responses from different LLMs. It focuses on chat completions and uses a standardized approach, allowing developers to easily integrate and compare results from providers like OpenAI, Anthropic, and others. The library also offers a straightforward way to add support for new providers.
key_features: Unified interface for multiple Generative AI providers
Easy swapping and testing of responses from different LLM providers
Uses HTTP endpoint or SDK for provider calls
Provider module naming convention for easy extension
primary_use_case: Simplifying interaction with multiple LLMs through a standardized interface for developers.
cover_image_prompt: Imagine a skilled conductor leading an orchestra where each instrument represents a different AI provider (OpenAI, Anthropic, etc.). The conductor uses a single, universal baton (aisuite) to harmonize the diverse sounds into a beautiful melody (consistent AI responses). Behind the orchestra, screens display the logos of various AI providers, subtly glowing with digital energy. The scene is bathed in soft, warm light, creating a sense of collaboration and ease. The image should be in a 3D isometric illustration style with vibrant colors and rich details, conveying the unified interface and simplified access to multiple AI providers.

name: graphrag
description: A modular graph-based Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) system
readme_summary: The GraphRAG project provides a data pipeline and transformation suite that leverages LLMs to extract meaningful, structured data from unstructured text. It utilizes knowledge graph memory structures to enhance an LLM's reasoning capabilities, particularly when dealing with private data. The repository offers tools and guidance for prompt tuning to optimize performance.
key_features: Extracts structured data from unstructured text using LLMs
Enhances LLM's ability to reason about private data
Knowledge graph memory structures to enhance LLM outputs
primary_use_case: Enhancing LLM's ability to reason about private data by extracting structured data from unstructured text using knowledge graphs.
cover_image_prompt: A skilled cartographer meticulously charting a vast, interconnected network of islands representing knowledge domains. The cartographer uses a magical quill that extracts information from scattered scrolls (unstructured data) and transforms it into precise lines and landmarks on the map (structured knowledge graph). A large magnifying glass hovers over the map, representing LLMs exploring and reasoning about the data. Subtle UI elements and glowing data streams connect the scene to software. The composition is clean and focused, with a warm, inviting color scheme. The image should be in a detailed 3D isometric illustration style.

name: x
readme_summary: Ant Design X provides a set of flexible atomic components and templates for building AI-driven interfaces. It offers features such as out-of-the-box model integration, efficient data flow management, and complete TypeScript support. The library is designed to streamline the development of personalized AI interaction experiences.
key_features: Derived from Best Practices of Enterprise-Level AI Products
Efficient Management of Conversation Data Flows
cover_image_prompt: A skilled artisan meticulously crafting AI interfaces with digital clay, shaping intelligent forms with ease and precision. The artisan's workshop is filled with glowing screens displaying intricate AI models and user interface designs. Small robotic assistants hover nearby, offering tools and suggestions. The scene is set in a bright, airy studio with a focus on creativity and innovation. The image should be in 3D isometric illustration style with rich details and vibrant colors.

name: Unciv
description: Open-source Android/Desktop remake of Civ V
readme_summary: Unciv is an open-source remake of Civ V for Android and Desktop, built with LibGDX. It prioritizes moddability, small size, and fast performance, making it suitable for lower-end devices. The game aims to provide an in-depth 4X strategy experience while remaining FOSS.
primary_use_case: Playing a moddable, open-source remake of Civilization V on Android and Desktop platforms.
cover_image_prompt: A skilled cartographer meticulously crafting a world map on a digital tablet, seamlessly blending historical cartography with modern technology. The map expands beyond the tablet screen, revealing a vibrant, evolving civilization with cities, resources, and strategic landscapes. The cartographer uses a stylus to add new features and refine existing ones, while subtle UI elements and code snippets float around the scene, representing the game's moddability. The scene is set in a bright, airy studio with a blend of antique maps and futuristic displays. The image should be in a detailed digital painting style with clear outlines and a warm color scheme.

name: forensictools
readme_summary: The forensictools repository provides a toolkit designed for digital forensics, simplifying the creation of a virtual environment for forensic examinations. It integrates various freely available forensic tools into the Windows PATH, enabling effortless command-line utilization. The repository hosts the source code to build the application package.
key_features: Simplifies creation of virtual environment for forensic examinations
Integrates tools into Windows PATH for command-line access
Provides a collection of freely available forensic tools
primary_use_case: Creating a virtual environment for conducting digital forensic examinations and providing easy access to forensic tools via the command line.
cover_image_prompt: A detective meticulously examining a digital fingerprint on a shattered hard drive, piecing together fragments of data with specialized tools. The detective uses a magnifying glass that projects holographic data visualizations, revealing hidden connections and timelines. Small UI elements displaying forensic software interfaces float around the scene, subtly connecting the investigation to digital technology. The scene is set in a dimly lit, high-tech forensic lab with a focused, analytical atmosphere. The image should be in a digital painting style with sharp details and a cool color palette, emphasizing the precision and complexity of digital forensics.
